mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_entry_info (eventInfoId, userId, nickName, entryTime, isCancel) VALUES (#{eventInfoId}, #{userId}, #{nickName}, #{entryTime}, #{isCancel} )
mapper.select: SELECT event_entry_info.entryTime, eventinfo.eventOpenDay, event_entry_info.eventInfoId, organizer_master.organizerName, iteminfo.itemInfoName, courtinfo.courtId, courtinfo.courtName FROM event_entry_info LEFT JOIN eventinfo ON event_entry_info.eventInfoId = eventinfo.eventInfoId JOIN organizer_master ON eventinfo.organizerId = organizer_master.organizerId JOIN iteminfo ON eventinfo.eventItemId = iteminfo.itemInfoId JOIN courtinfo ON eventinfo.eventCourtId = courtinfo.courtId WHERE event_entry_info.userId = #{userId}
